description: fully marked, Britannia Standard, on outer edge near handle; fully marked on bezel of detachable rim; leopard's head erased on each hinged handle
inscription:
Mark

- Engraved later, within an oval at the front, is the crest of Clinton encircled by the motto of the Order of the Garter, surmounted by a ducal coronet.
markings:
Mark

- Fully marked (Britannia standard) on outer edge near handle.  Fully marked on bezel of detachable rim.  Lion\'s head erased on each hinged handle.
title: Monteith
